title: "Trying to reconnect" in client, but internet works normal
body:
I get DCs in Client with no reason. When im in Queue it will get interrupted from the DC, but my internet is working normal. I cant play with my friends anymore because of that. On PBE client its the same. I tried the Hextech-Repair-Tool but it didnt helped. I added rules in firewall for everything i could find that is related to lol, but it didnt helped. I restarted my wifi and restarted my Pc, but nothing helped. I dont know what do do at this point. I would appreciate if i get a answer, where it doenst say "Go through this list of connection issue problems or something like that" Nothing of it helped. So Please! I want to play this game again.



{{champion:20}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:1}}

replies.body: Sorry this still happens despite all the troubleshooting.  :(  In this case, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  This will go to our tech team who can take a closer look and help you out directly.  See you there!
